Class Simon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Simon

  • public class Simon
extends java.lang.Object
    Drives an instance of the game Simon on the NXT using LeJOS
    Author:
    whmeitzler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void adjustDifficulty()
      Increases the speed of the game at points as defined by original MB game
      void displayColor(Simon.Color m)
      Paints the appropriate color and location to the LCD to indicate a Color
      (package private) void displayPath()
      Shows the current state of the game queue to the user Remembering that state is his job!
      boolean getResponsePath()
      Gets responses from the player, checking each against the game path
      private void lose()
      Informs the user he has lost Now with extra mocking!
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main method
      (package private) void playGame()
      Play a single game of Simon Returns when player has won or lost
      void reset()
      Clears out the game queue and offers the user to start another game
      private void win()
      Informs the user he has won! Plays a small victory jingle
